Name: Warrior
Description: A trained combatant and expert in melee attacks and personal defense.

ClassAbilities.Name: Power Strike
ClassAbilities.Effect: Make a melee attack. You may have the attack dice be one of your favoured sizes.

ClassAbilities.Name: Defensive training
ClassAbilities.Effect: When you roll for Defense you roll both your Dex and Con and take the higher result.

AbilityDeck.Name: Cleave
AbilityDeck.Description: Strike through your target to also hit a creature next to you.

Abilities.Name: Cleave
Abilities.Effect: Make a melee attack. If the attack hits you can make an additional Melee attack against a different target, using the same weapon.

AbilityDeck.Name: Soldiers Pride
AbilityDeck.Description: Seeing strength of arms is always a bolstering sight.

Abilities.Name: Soldiers Pride
Abilities.Effect: Whenever an ally within 3 spaces rolls the max value on a die, you heal 1 heart. If the die size was one you favour, heal 2 hearts instead.

AbilityDeck.Name: Lunging Strike
AbilityDeck.Description: Jump forward to hit a foe just out of reach.

Abilities.Name: Lunging Strike
Abilities.Effect: Make a melee attack. The range for the attack is increased by 1 space. If the attack uses your favoured dice, it instead is increased by 2.

AbilityDeck.Name: Forceful Blow
AbilityDeck.Description: Attack an enemy and potentially push them back.

Abilities.Name: Forceful Blow
Abilities.Effect: Make a melee attack. On a hit, the target is pushed away from you a number of squares equal to the damage they took.

AbilityDeck.Name: Martial Training
AbilityDeck.Description: You are an expert at knowing when to use force and flourish.

Abilities.Name: Steady Feet
Abilities.Effect: When an ally makes a melee attack, you can choose to reduce or increase the attacks dice size by 1.

AbilityDeck.Name: Shield Bash
AbilityDeck.Description: Strike with your shield to disrupt your enemy.

Abilities.Name: Shield Bash
Abilities.Effect: Make a melee attack with a shield. On a hit, the target is Staggered (their next action costs 2 AP). If you rolled a favored die, You may refresh a Warrior reaction.

AbilityDeck.Name: Bulwark Stance
AbilityDeck.Description: Hunker down and prepare for the enemy’s next assault.

Abilities.Name: Bulwark Stance
Abilities.Effect: At the start of your turn, you may forgo rolling for movement. If you do, you roll for defense twice and take the higher result until the start of your next turn or until you take damage.

AbilityDeck.Name: Armor Breaker
AbilityDeck.Description: Swing downward with extra force, crushing defenses.

Abilities.Name: Armor Breaker
Abilities.Effect: Make a melee attack, adding your Str to the attack roll. If the attack roll is equal to or greater than 10, the attack ignores armor bonuses to defense.

AbilityDeck.Name: Grit
AbilityDeck.Description: Your endurance keeps you fighting longer.

Abilities.Name: Grit
Abilities.Effect: At the start of your turn, if you have 3 or fewer hearts, roll your Con die. If the result is 6 or higher, regain 2 hearts.

AbilityDeck.Name: Sweeping Counter
AbilityDeck.Description: Deflect an enemy attack and follow up with your own.

Abilities.Name: Sweeping Counter
Abilities.Effect: When an enemy within 1 space attacks you and misses, you may make a melee attack against them immediately. If your attack uses a favored die, the attack roll has +1.

AbilityDeck.Name: Sundering Strike
AbilityDeck.Description: Your attacks break armor and leave foes vulnerable.

Abilities.Name: Sundering Strike
Abilities.Effect: Make a melee attack. If the attack roll is 8 or higher, the target does not gain the defensive benefits of their armor until the end of their next turn. If you rolled a favored die, the target also takes -1 on their next defense roll.

AbilityDeck.Name: Combat Repleneshment
AbilityDeck.Description: Your adept at keeping the fight going for as long as it takes.

Abilities.Name: Combat Repleneshment
Abilities.Effect: When a creature within 2 spaces rolls one of your Favoured Dice, you may refresh 2 other Warrior actions or reactions.

AbilityDeck.Name: Warrior’s Charge
AbilityDeck.Description: Close the distance with a devastating attack.

Abilities.Name: Warrior’s Charge
Abilities.Effect: Move up to 3 spaces in a straight line before making a melee attack. If you rolled a favored die for the attack and hit, you may move 3 more spaces and make an additional melee attack.

AbilityDeck.Name: Unyielding Guard
AbilityDeck.Description: You shield yourself and an ally from an incoming strike.

Abilities.Name: Unyielding Guard
Abilities.Effect: When an ally within 1 space makes a Defense roll, you can make one as well. The ally treats whatever roll was higher as their result.

AbilityDeck.Name: Sweeping Blow
AbilityDeck.Description: Your strikes hit multiple enemies with practiced efficiency.

Abilities.Name: Sweeping Blow
Abilities.Effect: Make a melee attack against two different creatures within reach. If you rolled a favored die, roll damage separately for each target.

AbilityDeck.Name: Colossus Stance
AbilityDeck.Description: Your unbreakable stance turns you into an immovable fortress.

Abilities.Name: Colossus Stance
Abilities.Effect: You cannot roll lower than an 8 on Defense rolls. You also cannot be moved or knocked prone.

AbilityDeck.Name: Executioner’s Strike
AbilityDeck.Description: Your weapon opens rivers of blood.

Abilities.Name: Executioner’s Strike
Abilities.Effect: Make a melee attack. If you roll a 10 or higher, the attack deals double damage. Refresh 3 other class Actions.

AbilityDeck.Name: Bulwark’s Protection
AbilityDeck.Description: You step in to shield an ally, taking the hit in their place.

Abilities.Name: Bulwark’s Protection
Abilities.Effect: When an ally within 3 spaces is attacked, you may move adjacent to them and become the target of the attack instead. If you roll a favored die for defense, you take only half damage. When an ally rolls one of your favoured dice, refresh this.

Name: Scout
Description: A master of exploration and ranged combat.

ClassAbilities.Name: Detect Weakpoints
ClassAbilities.Effect: Choose a creature within 5 spaces and roll your Wis die. The next defense roll the target makes is reduced by the result.

ClassAbilities.Name: Evasion
ClassAbilities.Effect: Gain +2 to defense rolls against attacks originating from more that 1 space away.

AbilityDeck.Name: Twin Shot
AbilityDeck.Description: Your quick reflexes allow you to fire multiple shots in rapid succession.

Abilities.Name: Twin Shot
Abilities.Effect: Make a ranged attack. If the attack hits, you may make another ranged attack against the same or a different target.

AbilityDeck.Name: Surveyor’s Instinct
AbilityDeck.Description: You scan ahead, choosing the best path forward.

Abilities.Name: Surveyor’s Instinct
Abilities.Effect: When revealing a new room, draw 2 Room cards and choose which one to place.

AbilityDeck.Name: Deadeye
AbilityDeck.Description: Your precision makes every shot count.

Abilities.Name: Deadeye
Abilities.Effect: When you roll your favored die for a ranged attack and roll max, the attack ignores armor bonuses to defense rolls.

AbilityDeck.Name: Quick Reflexes
AbilityDeck.Description: Your agility allows you to react to danger with ease.

Abilities.Name: Quick Reflexes
Abilities.Effect: When an enemy moves within 2 spaces of you, you may immediately move 1 space. When you roll max on a favoured die, refresh this ability.

AbilityDeck.Name: Trick Shot
AbilityDeck.Description: You angle your shots to hit enemies behind cover.

Abilities.Name: Trick Shot
Abilities.Effect: Make a ranged attack against a target in cover. If the attack uses a favored die, the cover provides no defensive bonus.

AbilityDeck.Name: Cautious Step
AbilityDeck.Description: You notice subtle signs of danger, helping you avoid trouble.

Abilities.Name: Cautious Step
Abilities.Effect: When entering a room with an encounter roll, roll twice and choose which result to use.

AbilityDeck.Name: Trap Sense
AbilityDeck.Description: Your keen senses warn you of hidden dangers.

Abilities.Name: Trap Sense
Abilities.Effect: When revealing a trap, you may roll your Dex. If the result is 6 or higher, the trap does not trigger and is instead disabled.

AbilityDeck.Name: Tactical Reroute
AbilityDeck.Description: You quickly assess the battlefield and adjust your approach.

Abilities.Name: Tactical Reroute
Abilities.Effect: When you or an ally within 3 spaces rolls for an ability, you may choose to reroll the die and take the new result.

AbilityDeck.Name: Steady Aim
AbilityDeck.Description: Your accuracy improves when you take the time to line up your shots.

Abilities.Name: Steady Aim
Abilities.Effect: If you do not move on your turn, your next attacks gains +1 to attack rolls, this stack on subsequent turns.

AbilityDeck.Name: Scout’s Respite
AbilityDeck.Description: Your efficiency in combat allows you to recover quickly.

Abilities.Name: Scout’s Respite
Abilities.Effect: When you roll max on a favored die for an attack, you may refresh one class ability.

AbilityDeck.Name: Sharpshooter
AbilityDeck.Description: Your precision allows you to strike from even greater distances.

Abilities.Name: Sharpshooter
Abilities.Effect: Your ranged attacks gain +2 spaces of range. If you use a favored die for the attack roll and roll 6 or higher, the attack ignores cover.

AbilityDeck.Name: Danger Sense
AbilityDeck.Description: You instinctively recognize when something feels off.

Abilities.Name: Danger Sense
Abilities.Effect: When entering a new room, roll a favored die. If the result is 6 or higher, you immediately learn if the room contains a trap or encounter before revealing it.

AbilityDeck.Name: Ambush Tactics
AbilityDeck.Description: You can catch enemies off guard when engaging first.

Abilities.Name: Ambush Tactics
Abilities.Effect: Make a ranged attack against a creature that has not acted yet in an encounter, you roll the attack die twice and add them together. If you roll a favored die and roll max, you can take another action.

AbilityDeck.Name: Calculated Retreat
AbilityDeck.Description: You know when to disengage and reposition.

Abilities.Name: Calculated Retreat
Abilities.Effect: When an enemy attacks you, you may move up to 2 spaces before the attack roll is made, potentially causing you to be out of range.

AbilityDeck.Name: Scout’s Gambit
AbilityDeck.Description: You make a quick call to aid yourself and your allies.

Abilities.Name: Scout’s Gambit
Abilities.Effect: At the start of your turn, roll a d6. On a 5 or higher, you or an ally of your choice may refresh one class ability.

AbilityDeck.Name: Treasure Seeker
AbilityDeck.Description: Your expertise in navigation ensures you always find the best loot.

Abilities.Name: Treasure Seeker
Abilities.Effect: When you would draw an item roll Dex. If the result if 5 or higher, you instead draw an item of 1 rarity higher.

AbilityDeck.Name: Unerring Instinct
AbilityDeck.Description: Your keen awareness allows you to succeed where others fail.

Abilities.Name: Unerring Instinct
Abilities.Effect: When making a skill check, you may roll two favored dice and take the higher result. If both rolls are the same, you automatically succeed.

AbilityDeck.Name: Sniper’s Focus
AbilityDeck.Description: Your unwavering focus makes every shot count.

Abilities.Name: Sniper’s Focus
Abilities.Effect: Make a ranged attack. It's range is doubled. If the attack uses a favored die, it deals double damage.

Name: Chaplain
Description: A devoted healer who can bolster allies.

ClassAbilities.Name: Healing Whisper
ClassAbilities.Effect: Restore 1 heart to an ally within 1 space.

ClassAbilities.Name: Divine Protection
ClassAbilities.Effect: Undead that attack you must roll their attack twice and take the lower result.

AbilityDeck.Name: Healing Grasp
AbilityDeck.Description: Your divine energy mends the wounds of your allies.

Abilities.Name: Healing Touch
Abilities.Effect: Restore a number of hearts to an ally within 1 space equal to a roll of your favored die.

AbilityDeck.Name: Blessed Guidance
AbilityDeck.Description: Your words fill an ally with confidence, improving their next action.

Abilities.Name: Blessed Guidance
Abilities.Effect: Choose an ally within 3 spaces. Their next roll increases its dice size by 1 (max d12).

AbilityDeck.Name: Hymn of Fortitude
AbilityDeck.Description: Your presence emboldens allies, making them tougher.

Abilities.Name: Hymn of Fortitude
Abilities.Effect: When you would roll Defense, you allies within 2 spaces add +1 to their next defense roll.

AbilityDeck.Name: Restorative Wave
AbilityDeck.Description: A burst of divine energy washes over your allies.

Abilities.Name: Restorative Wave
Abilities.Effect: Roll a d4. Up to two allies within 3 spaces each regain hearts equal to the result.

AbilityDeck.Name: Sacred Favor
AbilityDeck.Description: You bless an ally, ensuring their success.

Abilities.Name: Sacred Favor
Abilities.Effect: Before an ally rolls a die, you may declare it to be a favored die for this roll.

AbilityDeck.Name: Bolstering Chant
AbilityDeck.Description: Your divine chant fuels the next effort of an ally.

Abilities.Name: Bolstering Chant
Abilities.Effect: When an ally within 3 spaces rolls max on a die, they may roll an additional d4 and add it to the result.

AbilityDeck.Name: Martyr’s Resilience
AbilityDeck.Description: You take on some of the burden of an ally’s injuries.

Abilities.Name: Martyr’s Resilience
Abilities.Effect: When an ally within 2 spaces takes damage, you may take half of that damage instead.

AbilityDeck.Name: Divine Acceleration
AbilityDeck.Description: You call upon divine power to hasten an ally’s reflexes.

Abilities.Name: Divine Acceleration
Abilities.Effect: An ally within 3 spaces may immediately roll their Dex and move that many spaces.

AbilityDeck.Name: Rejuvenating Prayer
AbilityDeck.Description: Your prayers instill lasting resilience.

Abilities.Name: Rejuvenating Prayer
Abilities.Effect: At the start of your turn, roll a d4. One ally of your choice within 3 spaces regains hearts equal to the result.

AbilityDeck.Name: Beacon of Hope
AbilityDeck.Description: Your divine presence reassures those around you.

Abilities.Name: Beacon of Hope
Abilities.Effect: When an ally within 3 spaces rolls a 1, they may reroll once.

AbilityDeck.Name: Divine Intervention
AbilityDeck.Description: Your divine connection allows you to protect allies from disaster.

Abilities.Name: Divine Intervention
Abilities.Effect: When an ally within 3 spaces would take damage that would reduce them to 0 hearts, you may prevent all damage and restore 1d4 hearts instead.

AbilityDeck.Name: Celestial Insight
AbilityDeck.Description: You call upon divine wisdom to aid an ally’s decision-making.

Abilities.Name: Celestial Insight
Abilities.Effect: Before an ally makes a skill check, they may roll two dice and take the higher result. If both dice are favored, they gain +2 to the final roll.

AbilityDeck.Name: Blessing of Might
AbilityDeck.Description: You imbue an ally with divine power, enhancing their strength.

Abilities.Name: Blessing of Might
Abilities.Effect: Choose an ally within 3 spaces. Their next melee attack increases its attack die size by 2 (max d12).

AbilityDeck.Name: Radiant Protection
AbilityDeck.Description: A divine aura shields your allies from harm.

Abilities.Name: Radiant Protection
Abilities.Effect: For the next 3 turns, whenever an ally within 2 spaces rolls for defense, they add +1 to their roll.

AbilityDeck.Name: Miraculous Recovery
AbilityDeck.Description: Your healing is powerful enough to restore even the most grievous wounds.

Abilities.Name: Miraculous Recovery
Abilities.Effect: Restore a number of hearts to an ally within 3 spaces equal to double the result of a favored die roll.

AbilityDeck.Name: Judgment of the Divine
AbilityDeck.Description: Unleash holy fury, smiting all enemies in your path.

Abilities.Name: Judgment of the Divine
Abilities.Effect: A line of divine flame 6 spaces long and 2 spaces wide emanates from you in a direction you choose. Each creature in the line takes radiant damage equal to 2 rolls of your Wis.

AbilityDeck.Name: Resurrection’s Grace
AbilityDeck.Description: Bring an ally back from the brink of death with renewed strength.

Abilities.Name: Resurrection’s Grace
Abilities.Effect: When an ally within 4 spaces falls to 0 hearts. Restore hearts equal to double the result of a favored die roll. The next die the revived ally rolls counts as a favored die for them.

AbilityDeck.Name: Divine Benediction
AbilityDeck.Description: Your presence inspires greatness, elevating your allies’ abilities.

Abilities.Name: Divine Benediction
Abilities.Effect: For the first round of combat, all allies treat any die they roll as favored. If an ally rolls max on a die, this benefit gets extended by 1 turn, to a max of three total turns.

Name: Mystic
Description: A scholar of the arcane, capable of wielding powerful spells and curses.

ClassAbilities.Name: Fire Bolt
ClassAbilities.Effect: Make a ranged magic attack within 5 spaces using your Int. If you roll max, the attack ignores armor bonuses to defense..

ClassAbilities.Name: Arcane Defence
ClassAbilities.Effect: Your defense rolls use your Int instead of your Dex.

AbilityDeck.Name: Arcane Blast
AbilityDeck.Description: A simple yet effective magical projectile.

Abilities.Name: Arcane Bolt
Abilities.Effect: Make a ranged magic attack against two targets, who are adjacent to eachother, within 5 spaces. The targets are also pushed back 1 space.

AbilityDeck.Name: Mana Surge
AbilityDeck.Description: A surge of energy replenishes your magical prowess.

Abilities.Name: Mana Surge
Abilities.Effect: Roll a d4. You may refresh a number of class abilities equal to the result.

AbilityDeck.Name: Mystic Barrier
AbilityDeck.Description: A shimmering barrier shields you from harm.

Abilities.Name: Mystic Barrier
Abilities.Effect: When rolling for defense, you may roll an additional d4 and add it to your result.

AbilityDeck.Name: Mind Fracture
AbilityDeck.Description: A pulse of psychic energy disrupts an enemy’s mind.

Abilities.Name: Mind Fracture
Abilities.Effect: Choose an enemy within 4 spaces. They must roll their Wis die and you roll a d10. If their result is lower than yours, they become Staggered (their next action costs 2 AP).

AbilityDeck.Name: Ethereal Shift
AbilityDeck.Description: You briefly phase out of existence to avoid danger.

Abilities.Name: Ethereal Shift
Abilities.Effect: Before you take damage, you may roll a d4. If the result is 3 or higher, you teleport 2 spaces in any direction before the attack lands.

AbilityDeck.Name: Cursed Touch
AbilityDeck.Description: Your magic saps the strength of your enemies.

Abilities.Name: Cursed Touch
Abilities.Effect: Make a melee magic attack. On a hit, the targets next die roll is reduced by 1 size.

AbilityDeck.Name: Arcane Sight
AbilityDeck.Description: Your magic allows you to detect hidden forces.

Abilities.Name: Arcane Sight
Abilities.Effect: When entering a new room, you may roll a d4. On a 3 or higher, you immediately detect if the room has an encounter, a trap, or a magical effect.

AbilityDeck.Name: Warding Glyph
AbilityDeck.Description: You leave behind a sigil that weakens enemies.

Abilities.Name: Warding Glyph
Abilities.Effect: Choose a space within 3 spaces and place a glyph there. The first enemy to enter that space takes 1d4 arcane damage and rolls their next action at disadvantage.

AbilityDeck.Name: Force Ripple
AbilityDeck.Description: A small burst of magical force disrupts enemies around you.

Abilities.Name: Force Ripple
Abilities.Effect: All enemies within 2 spaces must roll their Con die and you roll a d10. If they roll lower than your d10, they are pushed a number of spaces away from you equal to the difference.

AbilityDeck.Name: Spellbound Reflexes
AbilityDeck.Description: Your magical awareness grants you quick reactions.

Abilities.Name: Spellbound Reflexes
Abilities.Effect: When an enemy within 3 spaces uses an action, you may roll a d4. If the result is 4, you may immediately take an action before they resolve theirs.

AbilityDeck.Name: Echoing Blast
AbilityDeck.Description: A burst of unstable magic that rebounds unpredictably.

Abilities.Name: Echoing Blast
Abilities.Effect: Choose a space within 4 spaces. All creatures in that space and adjacent spaces take damage equal to a d4 roll. If the dice rolls max, you may repeat this effect in a different space, increasing the size of the dice each time.

AbilityDeck.Name: Reality Fracture
AbilityDeck.Description: Tear at the fabric of reality, causing enemies to stumble.

Abilities.Name: Reality Fracture
Abilities.Effect: Roll your Int, target a number of enemies within 5 spaces equal to the result (minimum of 2). They must roll a d10 die. If their result is 5 or lower, they become Confused (they must roll a d6 before taking an action, on a 1-3 they lose that action).

AbilityDeck.Name: Aegis Ward
AbilityDeck.Description: A spectral shield forms around an ally, protecting them from harm.

Abilities.Name: Aegis Ward
Abilities.Effect: When an ally rolls Defense you can add your Int to their result. If they still take damage, refresh this ability.

AbilityDeck.Name: Devouring Shadows
AbilityDeck.Description: Summon a dark vortex that saps an enemy’s strength.

Abilities.Name: Devouring Shadows
Abilities.Effect: Choose a Space within 10 spaces. Creatures that start their turn in or adjacent to that space roll their Wis. If they roll 5 or less, they lose 2 AP on their next turn. If they rolled minnimum they also take 1d4 arcane damage.

AbilityDeck.Name: Arcane Feedback
AbilityDeck.Description: When an enemy attacks you, they suffer from your latent magic.

Abilities.Name: Arcane Feedback
Abilities.Effect: When a creature within 2 spaces attacks you, roll a d4. They take damage equal to the result, this damage cannot be reduced in any way. If you rolled max, they must also roll their Dex; if they roll lower than 4, they have disadvantage on the attack.

AbilityDeck.Name: Obliteration Wave
AbilityDeck.Description: Unleash the full power of arcane destruction in a massive burst.

Abilities.Name: Obliteration Wave
Abilities.Effect: Choose a point within 12 spaces. A wave of force erupts in a 2-space radius centered on that point. Each creature in the area takes damage equal to your two rolls of your Int. If either rolls max, the area expands by 1 space and you may roll another Int, dealing that much extra damage to all affected creatures, continuing the expansion on a max roll.

AbilityDeck.Name: Temporal Shackles
AbilityDeck.Description: You bind your enemies in ethereal chains, slowing their movements through time itself.

Abilities.Name: Temporal Shackles
Abilities.Effect: Enemies within 2 spaces must roll their Dex at the start of their turn. If they roll lower than a roll of your Int, they cannot move and cannot use Reactions until the start of their next turn. If you rolled max, they also lose 1 Action Point.

AbilityDeck.Name: Veil of the Unseen
AbilityDeck.Description: Bend the fabric of reality, making yourself and your allies untouchable for a moment.

Abilities.Name: Veil of the Unseen
Abilities.Effect: When an enemy attacks you or an ally, you can cause the target to fade away from reality, causing the next attack that would hit them miss entirely instead. Roll a d4, if you roll max you may repeat this ability, targeting a different ally.
